name: First Person PacMan
description:
It's like the Pacman game but in first person.

There are most features of Pacman but there are not fruits and ghosts AI are a bit different.

AI

Blinky (red ghost) : Always follows you.

Pinky (pink ghost) : Target your position and go to it before target again your position.

Clyde (orange ghost) : Go to random positions (the target position can be your position).

Inky (blue ghost) : Follow random ghosts.
